title.narrative: Wace Foundation: Reintegration of CAAFAGs in Masisi, North Kivu (pilot)

description.narrative: War Child has developed an understanding based on a care-system model that seeks to: identify and assess children associated with armed groups; create an individual care plan following demobilization and disarmament through a case management approach; strengthen resilience through access to restorative justice, mediation and dialogue to facilitate reconciliation and; reintegration through peacebuilding, awareness and advocacy, livelihoods, family reunification (or alternative care, psychosocial and educational support. We are now developing a new approach based on a series of community consultations to interrogate the design and implementation of War Child’s reintegration activities to date and suggest a feasible model to pilot/test in the Masisi area, North Kivu, with an eye to scale up, replication and supporting advocacy efforts for funding reintegration globally.
